question: What is your total monthly income (after taxes)?
What is your total debt amount?
What types of debt do you have (credit cards, student loans, personal loans, mortgage, car loan, etc.)?
Do you have any savings or emergency funds? How much do you have saved?
What are your fixed monthly expenses (rent, utilities, groceries, etc.)?
Are you currently contributing to savings or investment accounts while in debt?
Do you prefer to pay off smaller debts first (debt snowball method) or focus on high-interest debts (debt avalanche method)?
What skills do you have that could potentially increase your income (e.g., writing, coding, design)?
Are you open to freelancing or picking up side gigs to earn extra income?
Do you have any hobbies or personal interests that could be monetized?
On a scale from 1 to 10, how badly do you want to be debt-free?
